profile.name: Amos Wenger
profile.headline: @bearcove Senior Software Engineer | Rust Systems Programming Expert
profile.summary: Highly motivated and experienced software engineer with a strong passion for Rust systems programming. Proven track record of delivering high-quality projects, including GPU-accelerated cross-platform terminal emulators and lightweight animation libraries.

experience.title: @bearcove Senior Software Engineer
description: Led the development of wezterm, a GPU-accelerated cross-platform terminal emulator.
Designed and implemented various tools for Rust development, including cargo-bloat-lib and substance.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed a lightweight animation library for Dioxus.
Contributed to various open-source projects, including facet-rs/facet and bearcove/dodeca.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
